i want to find a file with x in its filename
All files with an x?  Can you narrow that down at all?
You can cut down the list too if necessary.  Say you know it's in your home directory somewhere, 'locate blah | grep /home/yourusername'.
If you lose a file the same day you get it though, you'll have to run 'sudo updatedb' to tell locate it's there in the first place.
